title: How to convince people in The Venus Project - Quora

response.answer_text: “Preaching” about the Venus Project will not change the minds of those deeply embedded in the current system. I suggest researching some science of persuasion to help discussions and even better, lead by example. There are lots of lifestyle choices we can all make that assist the transition into a resource-based economy. Speaking from our own experience, when your family and friends see the (hopefuly obvious) benefits of these changes, it can catalyse discussions and show by example.

Find a bridging point, introduce it lightly but let Jacque do the talking.  If you want to have a conversation with someone who knows nothing about it, you need to become extremely well versed in all aspects of it, because misrepresenting it does not help its cause.
